column12: New User for Clearing Firm "571" and Exchange "CBOE" !
New User for Clearing Firm "571" and Exchange "CBOE" !

AIM Auction Test Plan: Test Case 1:Market Maker creates Equity FLEX Product using AIM Auction.Product class is in Open state
Test Case 2:Broker Dealer creates Equity FLEX Product using AIM Auction
Test Case 3:Market Maker creates Index FLEX Product using AIM Auction window.Product class is in Open state
Test Case 4:Broker Dealer creates Index Flex Product using AIM Auction
Test Case 5:Verify that a Flex product with more than 15 years of expiration cannot be created
Test Case 6:Verify that a AIM product with exact 15 years of expiration can be created
Test Case 7:Verify that Fixed Simple product can be created using Start AIM auction window. Product class is in Fast state
Test Case 8:Verify that Fixed Simple product cannot be created using Start AIM auction window. Product class is in Pre_Open state
Test Case 9:Verify that Fixed Simple product can be created using Start AIM auction window. Product class is in Opening_Rotation state
Test Case 10:Verify that Fixed Simple product cannot be created using Start AIM auction window. Product class is in Halt state
Test Case 11:Verify that Fixed Simple product cannot be created using Start AIM auction window. Product class is in Suspended state
Test Case 12:Verify that AIM Auction cannot be created when price is 0.00
Test Case 13:Verify that AIM Auctions cannot be placed in Pre_Open state
Test Case 14:Verify that AIM Auctions can be placed in Fast state
Test Case 15:Verify that AIM Auctions can be placed in Opening rotation state
Test Case 16:Verify that AIM Auctions cannot be placed in Closed state
Test Case 17:Verify that AIM Auctions cannot be placed in Halt state
Test Case 18:Verify that AIM Auctions cannot be placed in Suspend state
Test Case 19:Verify that in an equity AIM auction PO and MO can have hedge price
Test Case 20:Verify that in an equity AIM auction PO and MO can have reference price
Test Case 21:Verify that in an index AIM auction PO and MO can have hedge price
Test Case 22:Verify that in an index AIM auction PO and MO can have reference price
Test Case 23:Verify that in an equity AIM auction PO and MO can have Pre-facilitation Hedge
Test Case 24:Verify that in an index AIM auction PO and MO can have Pre-facilitation Hedge

Test Case 25:Verify that AIM Auction for FLEX product will start with default value if the default value is defined timer is not defined at class level Auction Time To Live is not defined for other Auctions at class level

Test Case 26:Verify that FLEX auction for FLEX product will start with default Timer value if Timer is not defined at class level but has a default value defined Auction Time To Live is defined for other Auctions at class level
Test Case 27:Verify that PO and MO are cancelled when MO is AON and has configured AIM AON Minimum quantity
Test Case 28:Verify that AIM order cannot be started if PO and MO is not of origin F C M N and B
Test Case 29:Verify that PO and MO trade with each other when MO is AON and has configured AIM AON Minimum quantity
Test Case 30:Verify that regular AIM is started when PO is AON & MO is not AON and has configured AIM AON Minimum quantity
Test Case 31:Verify that AIM product with expiration date as a holiday cannot be created
